project_descr: European Union Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine – enhancing the border and customs management capacities

outputs.output_descr: European Union Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine phase 9 – enhancing the border and customs management capacities

EU Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine, phase 8. The project will assist the Republic of Moldova nad Ukraine in fulfilling their committments under the Europan association process, thus contributing to a peaceful resolution of the Transnistria conflict. The specific objectives are stated int the Description of the action.

EUBAM - 5, Management of the Moldovan/Ukrainian State border improved, contribution to the peaceful settlement of the Transnistria conflict delivered. The objectives of the project are: 1) to contribute to enhancing the overall border and customs management capacities and the abilities of Moldova na dUkraine to fight against cross-border and organised crime; 2) to assist Moldova and Ukraine in fulfilli

EU Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine, phase 7. Management of the Moldovan/Ukrainian State border improved, contribution to the peaceful settlement of the Transnistria conflict delivered. Moldova and Ukraine will receive assistance in fulfilling their committments under the European Neighbourhood Policy Action Plans (ENP AP) and the Partnership and Cooperation Agreements (PCA).
